languages.text: "Несмотря на все трудности — да, Ваша Светлость. Наставник был самым сильным голосом в хоре, и нам нелегко без него. Теперь отправка и дешифровка посланий дается сложнее, но каждый астропат прикладывает все усилия, чтобы не подвести династию".

traits.locale_text: "Несмотря на все трудности — да, Ваша Светлость. Наставник был самым сильным и мудрым голосом в хоре, и нам нелегко без него. Теперь отправка и дешифровка посланий дается сложнее, но каждый астропат прикладывает всевозможные усилия, чтобы не подвести династию".

languages.text: "Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."
languages.original_text: "Несмотря на все трудности — да, Ваша Светлость. Наставник был самым сильным голосом в хоре, и нам нелегко без него. Теперь отправка и дешифровка посланий дается сложнее, но каждый астропат прикладывает все усилия, чтобы не подвести династию".

traits.locale_text: "Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Master was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

"Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Master was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

"Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Master was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

"Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

"Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

languages.text: « Malgré toutes les difficultés, oui, Votre Seigneurie. Maître Weisz était la voix la plus forte de notre chœur, et notre tâche est d'autant plus ardue sans lui. L'envoi et le décryptage des messages sont bien plus compliqués qu'avant, mais tous les astropathes font de leur mieux pour ne pas faillir à leur devoir envers la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

traits.locale_text: « Malgré toutes les difficultés, oui, Votre Seigneurie. Maître Weisz était la voix la plus forte de notre chœur, et notre tâche est d'autant plus ardue sans lui. L'envoi et le décryptage des messages sont bien plus compliqués qu'avant, mais tous les astropathes font de leur mieux pour ne pas faillir à leur devoir envers la dynastie. »

languages.text: «Sí, mil{mf|ord|ady}, aunque no sin dificultades. El maestro Weisz era la voz más fuerte del Coro; no nos está resultado fácil continuar sin él. Ahora nos cuesta más enviar y descifrar mensajes, pero nuestros Astrópatas están haciendo todo lo posible por no decepcionar a la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, mil{mf|ord|ady}, aunque no sin dificultades. El maestro Weisz era la voz más fuerte del Coro; no nos está resultado fácil continuar sin él. Ahora nos cuesta más enviar y descifrar mensajes, pero nuestros Astrópatas están haciendo todo lo posible por no decepcionar a la dinastía».

languages.text: 「あらゆる困難にもかかわらず…はい、陛下。ワイズ様は聖歌隊の中で最も力強い声でしたので、彼なしでは簡単ではありません。メッセージを送ることや解読することは難しくなりましたが、どの感応通信官も王朝を失望させないよう最大限の努力をしています」
languages.original_text: "Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆる困難にもかかわらず…はい、陛下。ワイズ様は聖歌隊の中で最も力強い声でしたので、彼なしでは簡単ではありません。メッセージを送ることや解読することは難しくなりましたが、どの感応通信官も王朝を失望させないよう最大限の努力をしています」

languages.text: “尽管工作变得非常困难，但我们还能坚持得住，大人。威茨大师原本是星语唱诗班最坚定有力的声音，失去了他，发送与破译信息的工作变得非常困难。但即便如此，每位星语者都在竭尽全力，不会令王朝失望。”
languages.original_text: "Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

traits.locale_text: “尽管工作变得非常困难，但我们还能坚持得住，大人。威茨大师原本是星语唱诗班最坚定有力的声音，失去了他，发送与破译信息的工作变得非常困难。但即便如此，每位星语者都在竭尽全力，不会令王朝失望。”

languages.text: "Trotz aller Schwierigkeiten ... ja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Meister Weisz war die stärkste Stimme im Chor, und es ist für uns nicht einfach ohne ihn. Das Senden und Entschlüsseln von Nachrichten ist jetzt schwieriger, aber jeder Astropath tut sein Bestes, um die Dynastie nicht zu enttäuschen."
languages.original_text: "Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."

traits.locale_text: "Trotz aller Schwierigkeiten ... ja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Meister Weisz war die stärkste Stimme im Chor, und es ist für uns nicht einfach ohne ihn. Das Senden und Entschlüsseln von Nachrichten ist jetzt schwieriger, aber jeder Astropath tut sein Bestes, um die Dynastie nicht zu enttäuschen."

languages.text: "Tüm zorluklara rağmen getirebiliyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Üstat Weisz, Koro'daki en kuvvetli sesin sahibiydi. O olmadan yolumuza devam etmek kolay değil. Mesajları gönderip deşifre etmek artık daha zor olsa da tüm Astropatlar, hanedanlığı hayal kırıklığına uğratmamak için ellerinden geleni yapıyor."
languages.original_text: "Despite all the difficulties — yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Master Weisz was the strongest voice in the Choir, and it is not easy for us without him. Sending and deciphering messages is harder now, but every Astropath is doing their utmost not to let the dynasty down."
